sections.title: Mystery Cultist (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Mystery Cultist class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Mystery Cultist)
sections.description: Mystery cultists gain proficiency with all simple weapons and their celestial patron's favored weapon, but gain no armor or shield proficiencies.

sections.title: Spells per Day/Spells Known (Mystery Cultist)
sections.description: Mystery cultist levels advance spellcasting progression from a previous spellcasting class, granting additional spells per day and known without other class benefits.

sections.title: Blessed (Ex) (Mystery Cultist)
sections.description: Upon death, the mystery cultist's soul goes to good outer planes to become a celestial outsider, and if resurrected can gain knowledge as if using contact other plane to reach their empyreal lord patron.

sections.title: Obedience (Ex) (Mystery Cultist)
sections.description: Mystery cultists must perform daily obedience to their empyreal lord patron to maintain all class abilities including spellcasting.

sections.title: Glorious Aura (Su) (Mystery Cultist)
sections.description: The mystery cultist can activate an aura that grants +4 sacred bonus to Charisma and causes a 10-foot fear aura that can frighten enemies for 1d4 rounds.

sections.title: Celestial Boon (Mystery Cultist)
sections.description: Mystery cultists gain three increasingly powerful boons from their empyreal lord patron at 3rd, 6th, and 9th levels, accessing them earlier than normal.

sections.title: Brand of Healing (Sp) (Mystery Cultist)
sections.description: Once per day, the mystery cultist can cast heal as a spell-like ability, which brands the target with an incandescent holy symbol tattoo that lasts 24 hours.

sections.title: Summon Celestial (Sp) (Mystery Cultist)
sections.description: Mystery cultists can summon good outsiders using summon monster VI at 4th level and summon monster VIII at 8th level to conjure celestial creatures like lillends, bralanis, and archons.

sections.title: Fervor (Su) (Mystery Cultist)
sections.description: Mystery cultists can enter a religious fervor granting combat bonuses, DR 5/evil, increased caster level, and speed, but suffer Charisma penalties afterward.

sections.title: Incorruptible (Su) (Mystery Cultist)
sections.description: Grants +2 bonus on saves vs disease and poison, prevents body decomposition like gentle repose, and prevents undead transformation except by wish or miracle.

sections.title: Sacred Haven (Su) (Mystery Cultist)
sections.description: The mystery cultist gains a personal room on the celestial planes that can be accessed once per day via plane shift with allies, equipped with beds, library, shrine, and portable hole storage.
